Text: Isaac Asimov's Magical Worlds of Fantasy is a series of twelve themed paperback fantasy and science fiction anthologies edited by Isaac Asimov, Martin H. Greenberg and Charles G. Waugh, a companion set to the ten volume "Isaac Asimov's Wonderful Worlds of Science Fiction", produced by the same editors.

<Text: Isaac Asimov's Magical Worlds of Fantasy:  It was published by Signet/New American Library from 1983 to 1991.>

Text: Isaac Asimov's Magical Worlds of Fantasy:  Volumes 1 and 2 were also issued in hardcover in an omnibus collection titled "Isaac Asimov's Magical Worlds of Fantasy: Witches & Wizards".
